Name: Haydenistic
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Extremely subtle, like a very complex wet Vodkatini .
History: Created in 2007 by Hayden Lambert at The Merchant Hotel, Belfast, Northern Ireland.
Nutrition: One serving of Haydenistic contains 160 calories
